current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To establish student loan interest rates, and for other
		  purposes.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and
			 ordered placed on the calendar

action-desc.#text: Read twice and ordered placed on the calendar

short-title.#text:
Bipartisan Student Loan Certainty Act
			 of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 455(b) of the
			 Higher Education Act of 1965

text.#text: in
in the paragraph heading, by inserting
in
in

a
				rate equal to the high yield of the 10-year Treasury note auctioned at the
				final auction held prior to such June 1 plus 2.05 percent; or

8.25
				percent.

header.#text:
Rates for
				undergraduate fdsl and fdusl

text.#text:
Notwithstanding the preceding
				paragraphs of this subsection, for Federal Direct Stafford Loans and Federal
				Direct Unsubsidized Stafford Loans issued to undergraduate students, for which
				the first disbursement is made on or after July 1, 2013, the applicable rate of
				interest shall, for loans disbursed during any 12-month period beginning on
				July 1 and ending on June 30, be determined on the preceding June 1 and be
				equal to the lesser of—

a
				rate equal to the high yield of the 10-year Treasury note auctioned at the
				final auction held prior to such June 1 plus 3.6 percent; or

9.5
				percent.

header.#text:
Rates for
				graduate and professional fdusl

text.#text:
Notwithstanding the preceding
				paragraphs of this subsection, for Federal Direct Unsubsidized Stafford Loans
				issued to graduate or professional students, for which the first disbursement
				is made on or after July 1, 2013, the applicable rate of interest shall, for
				loans disbursed during any 12-month period beginning on July 1 and ending on
				June 30, be determined on the preceding June 1 and be equal to the lesser
				of—

a
				rate equal to the high yield of the 10-year Treasury note auctioned at the
				final auction held prior to such June 1 plus 4.6 percent; or

10.5
				percent.

Notwithstanding the preceding paragraphs of this
				subsection, for Federal Direct PLUS Loans, for which the first disbursement is
				made on or after July 1, 2013, the applicable rate of interest shall, for loans
				disbursed during any 12-month period beginning on July 1 and ending on June 30,
				be determined on the preceding June 1 and be equal to the lesser of—

Notwithstanding the preceding paragraphs of this
				subsection, any Federal Direct Consolidation Loan for which the application is
				received on or after July 1, 2013, shall bear interest at an annual rate on the
				unpaid principal balance of the loan that is equal to the weighted average of
				the interest rates on the loans consolidated, rounded to the nearest higher
				one-eighth of one percent.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall determine the applicable rate of interest under this paragraph
				after consultation with the

and shall publish such
				rate in the Federal Register as soon as practicable after the date of
				determination.

text.#text: The

The
				applicable rate of interest determined under this paragraph for a Federal
				Direct Stafford Loan, a Federal Direct Unsubsidized Stafford Loan, or a Federal
				Direct PLUS Loan shall be fixed for the period of the
				loan.

header.#text:
Interest rate
				provisions for new loans on or after July 1, 2013

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall take effect as
			 if enacted on July 1, 2013.
